question: Will the Ethereum Merge (EIP-3675) occur by September 1, 2022?
description:
This is a market on if The Merge will occur on the Ethereum mainnet as described in EIP-3675 (or any successor to EIP-3675) by the resolution time, September 1 2022, 11:59:59 PM ET, transitioning the Ethereum blockchain to proof-of-stake.

If the first proof-of-stake block (defined in EIP-3675 as TRANSITION_BLOCK) is produced before the resolution time, this market will resolve to "Yes". 
Otherwise, the market will resolve "No".

Note, that forks to the execution layer and the consensus layer implementing EIP-3675 will not have any impact on the market resolution. Only the actual occurrence of The Merge will be considered.

events.title: When will Ethereum Merge to Proof-of-Stake?
events.description:
This is a market group on when "The Merge" will occur on the Ethereum mainnet as described in EIP-3675 (or any successor to EIP-3675), transitioning the Ethereum blockchain to proof-of-stake.

Note that forks to the execution layer and the consensus layer implementing EIP-3675 will not have any impact on the market resolution. Only the actual occurrence of The Merge will be considered.

question: NHL: Will the Devils beat the Canadiens by more than 1.5 goals in their April 7, 7:00 PM ET matchup?
description:
In the upcoming NHL game, scheduled for April 7, 7:00 PM ET:

If the New Jersey Devils win by over 1.5 goals, the market will resolve to “Yes”.

If the Montréal Canadiens lose by less than 1.5 goals or win, the market will resolve to “No”.

If the game is not completed by April 14 (11:59:59 PM ET), the market will resolve 50-50.

question: Will the 7-day COVID-19 case average in the USA be below 20,000 by May 31?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if the 7-day COVID-19 Case average is below 20,000 in the US for any day ranging from April 6, 2022 to May 31, 2022 inclusive, and “No” otherwise. The resolution source for this market is the CDC; https://covid.cdc.gov/covid-data-tracker/#trends_dailytrendscases. 

To account for potential data revisions and/or incompleteness: the market will be checked daily at 8 PM ET to see if any day within the aforementioned range has a 7-day COVID-19 case average below 20,000. These daily checks will occur from April 7, 2022 to June 7, 2022 (inclusive). If an average below 20,000 is detected, it will be checked again 7 days later. If it is still under 20,000 at that point, the market will be resolved. If it is 20,000 or above, then the market will not resolve based on that data point.

question: Will Twitter add an edit button by June 30?
description:
If Twitter allows a majority of users to edit Tweets by June 30, 2022, 11:59:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "Yes". Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The ability to edit a Tweet means a user can edit the text within a tweet, for any length of time after it is published to their timeline. For example, if the tweets are only editable for 5 seconds after being published, it will count.

If a new Twitter account can be made and has access to the edit feature, it will suffice to resolve this market to “Yes.” 

If the ability for the majority of users to edit Tweets is instituted for any length of time, this market will resolve to "Yes”, regardless of whether the editing ability is later removed.

For the purpose of settling this market, an announcement that users will have the ability to edit Tweets within the market timeframe will not be sufficient to resolve this market to "Yes". This market will only resolve to "Yes" if the majority of users are granted the ability to edit Tweets within the market timeframe.

The resolution source for this market is https://www.twitter.com.

question: Will annual inflation in the European Union be 7.8% or more in March?
description:
This is a market on a year-to-year inflation, as measured by the Eurostat (HICP), from March 2021 to March 2022.

This market will resolve to “Yes” if the European Union annual inflation in March 2022 is 7.8 percent or more and "No" otherwise.

The resolution source for this market will be the Eurostat, the statistical office of the European Union: https://ec.europa.eu/eurostat/web/products-euro-indicators.

The next release of HICP inflation rate with full data for March 2022 is scheduled for April 21, 2022.

Note, that this market is about the inflation for all European Union Member States, not only the Euro zone (states using €).

The Inflation dashboard for the Euro zone can be viewed here: https://www.ecb.europa.eu/stats/macroeconomic_and_sectoral/hicp/html/index.en.html
